Author: quietlyinteresting
Text: My safe food use to be sweat potatoes. Really hard to get in Ireland at times but always worth the search. After a long day working. I would sit at my kitchen and watch them golden in the oven. A sense of anticipation. A feeling of safety. I controlled the space I occupied.   Till one day I got a new cooker and oven. Everything changed. Changed utterly forever.       Amazing how somethings can make you feel so safe and when you lose it you feel so lost,
